StringTable.Label: SolSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The human solar system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: DrengiSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin home system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: AltariaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Altarian home system containing a class 10 and a class 6 world.

StringTable.Label: IridiaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iridium home system containing a class 12 and a class 4 world.

StringTable.Label: IconiaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient Iconian, and now Yor, home system. It contains a single class 16 world.

StringTable.Label: KrysethSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynn home system. It contains a class 8, and two class 4 worlds.

StringTable.Label: IconisSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The new home system of the Iconian race containing a class 13 and a class 3 world.

StringTable.Label: ThalisSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home of the Thalan Contingency in this Universe. It contains a single class 16 world.

StringTable.Label: SnathiSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient home of the Snathi It contains a single class 15 (Bread Basket) world.

StringTable.Label: MinorSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Randomized home system for Minor Races. It contains a class 16 world.

StringTable.Label: DeadSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: A ruined star system. No Habitable Planets, Just a burned out Rock. Used by the brave and adventuresome.

StringTable.Label: ArceaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the Arcean Empire containing a 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: TorusSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the Torian Regime, containing class 5 and 11 Aquatic worlds. Not recommended for non Aquatic races.

StringTable.Label: StarterSereneSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Contains a beautiful class 12 world with a bonus to Tourism and Approval.

StringTable.Label: OnyxSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the Onyx, an Asteroid heavy system, containing a Class 11 and a Class 5 world, both with Active Cores.

StringTable.Label: SlyneSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the Slyne containing a class 11 Shrouded World and a class 9 Frozen world.

StringTable.Label: ProximaCentauriSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the exiled Terran Resistance. With a single Class 15 Shielded world.

StringTable.Label: KoraSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the Korath.

StringTable.Label: DrathaSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The home system of the Drath.

StringTable.Label: TywomSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Tywom solar system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: MukaySystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Mukay solar system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: MowlingsSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Mowlings solar system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: FreeTrandalsSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Free Trandals solar system containing a class 11 and a class 5 world.

StringTable.Label: ScryveSpace_Dec
StringTable.String: The trial by fire known as home to the Scryve Empire.

StringTable.Label: MeasuredSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The hungry little hometown to the race known as the Phamysht.

StringTable.Label: XrakiSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Perfect, terrible, nothing, doesn't belong in such a small galaxy.
